verbs.description: relive (third-person singular simple present relives, present participle reliving, simple past and past participle relived)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To experience (something) again; to live over again. [from 18th c.]
examples: I relive that horrible accident every night and wake screaming.
Replays in video games allow you to relive your greatest moments.

entries.meaning: (obsolete, transitive) To bring back to life; to revive, resuscitate. [16th–17th c.]
